tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE counterparty_credit_risk (
  counterparty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  credit_rating VARCHAR(50),
  exposure_limit DECIMAL(15, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE CreditRating (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    counterparty_id UUID NOT NULL,
    credit_rating TEXT NOT NULL,
    valid_from TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL,
    valid_to TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    FOREIGN KEY (counterparty_id) REFERENCES Counterparty(counterparty_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExposureLimit (
    exposure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    counterparty_id UUID NOT NULL,
    exposure_limit DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    valid_from TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL,
    valid_to TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
    FOREIGN KEY (counterparty_id) REFERENCES Counterparty(counterparty_id)
);
